item.title: histoday
item.description: I had an idea which I wanted to bring to life and apparently, this week is THE week! This Python script will show the events happened on the day the script is run. Take a look! As a side note, this is just the first version. I’m counting on my self-motivation and the community on improving this. I hope you find it entertaining and informative! I';m fetching the events from history.
